name: Flash
description: Make an object temporarily flash, alternately becoming visible and invisible.

conditions.name: Is flashing
conditions.description: True if the object is currently flashing.

conditions.name: On flash ended
conditions.description: Triggered when the object stops flashing.

actions.name: Flash
actions.description: Make the object flash for a period of time.

params.name: 'On' time
params.description: Duration in seconds the object is visible.

params.name: 'Off' time
params.description: Duration in seconds the object is invisible.

params.name: Duration
params.description: Duration in seconds the object flashes for.

actions.name: Stop flashing
actions.description: Stop the flashing and set the object visible.
